009package Ch20_DiscreteCosineTransform;
010
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
019import imagingbook.spectral.dct.Dct2d;
020import imagingbook.spectral.dct.Dct2dDirect;
021import imagingbook.spectral.dct.Dct2dFast;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * Calculates and displays the 2-dimensional DCT after converting the input
026 * image to a float image. of arbitrary size. Optionally, either a direct DCT or
027 * a fast DCT implementation is used, using either {@code float} or
028 * {@code double} data. See Ch. 20 of [1] for additional details.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
032 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
033 * </p>
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/04/01
037 */
038public class DCT_2D_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        private static boolean UseFastMode = true;
041        private static boolean UseDoublePrecision = false;
042        private static boolean ShowLogSpectrum = true;
043        private static boolean ReconstructImage = true;
044        
045        private ImagePlus im;
046        private int w, h;
047        private FloatProcessor reconstruction = null;
048
049        @Override
050        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
051                this.im = im;
052                return DOES_8G + DOES_32 + NO_CHANGES;
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
057                if (!runDialog()) 
058                        return;
059
060                w = ip.getWidth();
061                h = ip.getHeight();
062                FloatProcessor fp = ip.convertToFloatProcessor();
063                FloatProcessor spectrum = (UseDoublePrecision) ? runDouble(fp) : runFloat(fp);
064                        
065                if (ShowLogSpectrum) {
066                        spectrum.abs();
067                        spectrum.add(1.0);
068                        spectrum.log();
069                }
070                
071//              spectrum.resetMinAndMax();              // why doesn't this work?
072                spectrum.setMinAndMax(0, 255);
073                IJ.log("min = " + spectrum.getMin());
074                IJ.log("max = " + spectrum.getMax());
075                String name = im.getShortTitle();
076                String title = (ShowLogSpectrum) ?
077                                name + "-DCT (log. spectrum)" : name + "-DCT (spectrum)";
078                new ImagePlus(title, spectrum).show();
079                
080                // ----------------------------------------------------
081                
082                if (ReconstructImage) {
083                        reconstruction.setMinAndMax(0, 255);
084                        new ImagePlus(name + "-reconstructed", reconstruction).show();
085                }
086
087        }
088        
089        private FloatProcessor runFloat(FloatProcessor fp) {
090                Dct2d.Float dct = (UseFastMode) ? new Dct2dFast.Float(w, h) : new Dct2dDirect.Float(w, h);
091                float[][] g = fp.getFloatArray();
092
093                // calculate the forward DCT:
094                dct.forward(g);
095                FloatProcessor spectrum = new FloatProcessor(g);
096                
097                if (ReconstructImage) {
098                        dct.inverse(g);
099                        this.reconstruction = new FloatProcessor(g);
100                }
101                
102                return spectrum;
103        }
104        
105        private FloatProcessor runDouble(FloatProcessor fp) {
106                Dct2d.Double dct = (UseFastMode) ? new Dct2dFast.Double(w, h) : new Dct2dDirect.Double(w, h);
107                double[][] g = Matrix.toDouble(fp.getFloatArray());
108
109                // calculate the forward DCT:
110                dct.forward(g);
111                FloatProcessor spectrum = new FloatProcessor(Matrix.toFloat(g));
112
113                if (ReconstructImage) {
114                        dct.inverse(g);
115                        this.reconstruction = new FloatProcessor(Matrix.toFloat(g));
116                }
117
118                return spectrum;
119        }
120        
121        // ---------------------------------------------------------------
122
123        private boolean runDialog() {
124                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(getClass().getSimpleName());
125                gd.addCheckbox("Use fast transform", UseFastMode);
126                gd.addCheckbox("Use double precision", UseDoublePrecision);
127                gd.addCheckbox("Show absolute/log spectrum", ShowLogSpectrum);
128                gd.addCheckbox("Reconstruct the input image", ReconstructImage);
129                
130                gd.showDialog(); 
131                if (gd.wasCanceled()) 
132                        return false;
133                
134                UseFastMode = gd.getNextBoolean();
135                UseDoublePrecision = gd.getNextBoolean();
136                ShowLogSpectrum = gd.getNextBoolean();
137                ReconstructImage = gd.getNextBoolean();
138                return true;
139        }
140
141
142}
